//Atoms in the  Lab

#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>



int main()
{
	long long int p;
	scanf("%lld",&p);
	while(p--)
	{
		long long int n,m,k,sum;
		scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&n,&k,&m);

		long long int count=(long long int)0;
		sum=(long long int)n;
	
	   while(1)
        {
            if((double)sum * (double)k>(double)m)break;
            sum=sum * k;
            count++;
        }


		printf("%lld\n",count);
	}
//	system("pause");
	return 0;
}
